Package simulation.mmsolve

Class ConvergenceException.Builder

java.lang.Object
simulation.mmsolve.ConvergenceException.Builder
Enclosing class:
ConvergenceException
public static class ConvergenceException.Builder extends Object
A builder class for creating instances of ConvergenceException.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ConvergenceException
    build()
    Creates a new ConvergenceException with all configuration options that have been specified by calling methods on this builder.
    ConvergenceException.Builder
    setCause​(Throwable cause)
    Sets the cause of the convergence error.
    ConvergenceException.Builder
    setConvergenceDistance​(double convergenceDistance)
    Sets the distance (sum of absolute value of difference between the magnetic moment value and its required value, divided by the number of spins) from convergence at the time of the error.
    ConvergenceException.Builder
    setFlippedSpin​(int flippedSpin)
    Sets the spin that was flipped leading to the convergence error.
    ConvergenceException.Builder
    setIndex​(int index)
    Sets the iteration index at the time of the failed convergence.
    ConvergenceException.Builder
    setNumManualCalc​(int numManualCalc)
    Sets number of times a manual diagonalization (as opposed to an interpolation) was performed until the convergence error.

  • Constructor Details

    • Builder

      public Builder​(String errorMessage, String errorLocation)
      Creates a new builder object with the mandatory input fields.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - - an error message indicating which methods were tried and failed.
      errorLocation - - where (in which method and in which stage) the convergence error occurred.

  • Method Details

    • setIndex

      public ConvergenceException.Builder setIndex​(int index)
      Sets the iteration index at the time of the failed convergence.
      Parameters:
      index - - the iteration index
      Returns:
      a reference to this Builder

    • setNumManualCalc

      public ConvergenceException.Builder setNumManualCalc​(int numManualCalc)
      Sets number of times a manual diagonalization (as opposed to an interpolation) was performed until the convergence error.
      Parameters:
      numManualCalc - - number of manual diagonalization calculations
      Returns:
      a reference to this Builder

    • setConvergenceDistance

      public ConvergenceException.Builder setConvergenceDistance​(double convergenceDistance)
      Sets the distance (sum of absolute value of difference between the magnetic moment value and its required value, divided by the number of spins) from convergence at the time of the error.
      Parameters:
      convergenceDistance - - sum of absolute value of difference between the magnetic moment value and its required value, divided by the number of spins
      Returns:
      a reference to this Builder

    • setCause

      public ConvergenceException.Builder setCause​(Throwable cause)
      Sets the cause of the convergence error.
      Parameters:
      cause - - cause for convergence failure, given by the Broyden of Newton methods (singular Jacobian or something of that sort)
      Returns:
      a reference to this Builder

    • setFlippedSpin

      public ConvergenceException.Builder setFlippedSpin​(int flippedSpin)
      Sets the spin that was flipped leading to the convergence error.
      Parameters:
      flippedSpin - - ordinal number of the flipped spin
      Returns:
      a reference to this Builder

    • build

      public ConvergenceException build()
      Creates a new ConvergenceException with all configuration options that have been specified by calling methods on this builder.
      Returns:
      the new ConvergenceException
